bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Preservative Treatment of Wood Distribution and Transmission Line Structures
IEEE Guide for Preservative Treatment of Wood Distribution and Transmission Line Structures

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide discusses the preservative treatment of both distribution and transmission wood poles. The guide includes definitions, descriptions of equipment, methods of treatment, information about preservatives, and preparation and specifications for treatment.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
